Posts.Content: Mamacross03 wrote: Hello. I have had a very red and splotchy breast for about a week. I had an diagnostic mammogram and ultrasound today and they both showed no lumps. My question is this. Have any of you had the red breast, then had it get better but not completely go away and then be diagnosed with ibc? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Redness Mamacross03 Kicks
